name: COFFEE RUN (itch) (sharonOmotomiwa)
description:
Welcome to our endless runner game featuring stunning Art by Cartoon Coffee. Run as far as you can, avoid obstacles, and collect points along the way with simple and intuitive controls. Use the up and down arrows or WASD keys to move, and press down midair or on the ground to perform special moves like airslamming or sliding. Ready to start your never-ending adventure? Play now!

Controls:

  • Press the up arrow or the W key to jump and avoid obstacles.
  • Press the down arrow or the S key to slide while on the ground.
  • Press the down arrow or the S key while in the air to perform an airslam onto an interactable and gain points.
  • Also you could Press the Enter key to perform an airslam onto an interactable and gain points.
  • And Also Press the space bar to jump.
